name: Aim Project: Elite
description:
Aim Project: Elite is a passion project by students attending a game development school designed to put your reactivity to the test! Gain points for speed and accuracy in this fast-paced aim-training simulation. 

This game is still in its early stages. More maps, modes, secrets, and more will be added regularly so keep an eye out!

It is recommended to use itch.io launcher so your game will auto-update.

Donations are greatly appreciated and will be put back into the game for more enjoyable updates!

Public Release: February 22, 2022
